metadata.name: Yosemite Valley
metadata.description:
3D model rendering showing the path of the finish machining bit carving the surface of the Earth in Yosemite Valley, California into wood. 

This NFT is accompanied by an IRL physical 18x24 inch carving in Baltic Birch plywood. Photos [here](https://terraligna.com/foundation-nfts/yosemite). 

This can be carved into any size, in any type of wood. For additional info, please visit <http://terraligna.com>

20% of the proceeds of the initial sale will be donated to the Truckee Roundhouse Community Makerspace where it was created.  <http://truckeeroundhouse.org>
